active_ingredients: Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Octocrylene, Tocopheryl Acetate, Allantoin, Panthenol, Artemisia Capillaris Flower Extract
